name: Dustman
overview: Meet Alf, the Dustman. Not any ordinary dustman, but a hyper-intelligent mega-dustman. He has found himself in a spot of bovver with neither lawnmowers nor bears, but numerous tons of homicidal rubbish. To make life even more difficult (and confusing) his favourite beer is in hot pursuit! But there is help on the way, "The friends of the Binless" try to assist Alf in overcoming the evil waste. Meet Alf, his friends, his enemies, and 20 waves of sheer madness.
